block.rsrequestify.crafting_emitter.tool: Emits a Redstone Signal when there is a crafting task of the item/fluid in the filter and the crafting amount is equal or greater than the specified amount.
block.rsrequestify.requester.tooltip: Keeps the filtered item/fluid in stock with the desired amount.
block.rsrequestify.requester.tooltip.fil: The resources that should be kept in stock in the storage network
block.rsrequestify.crafting_emitter.tool: The resources that should emit a redstone signal
